original_text: Long ago, he already decided to accept us into his family as his children, because of Jesus Christ. He chose us to belong to him because it made him very happy.
korean_text: 그 기쁘신 뜻대로 우리를 예정하사 예수 그리스도로 말미암아 자기의 아들들이 되게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: Long ago, he already decided to accept us
sentences.korean_translation: 오래 전에 그는 이미 우리를 받아들이기로 결정하셨고

sentences.original_text: into his family as his children
sentences.korean_translation: 우리를 그의 자녀로서 그의 가족으로 받아들이셨습니다
